DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety PRO-148 ophthalmic solution compare SYSTANE ® ophthalmic solution treatment sign symptoms mild-to-moderate dry eye syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety PRO-148 Ophthalmic Solution Versus SYSTANE® Treatment Patients With Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: A phase 2 , randomize , double mask clinical , parallel-group clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety PRO-148 ophthalmic solution compare SYSTANE ® ophthalmic solution treatment sign symptoms mild-to-moderate dry eye syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosis mildtomoderate drye eye syndrome . Male female patient . Patients 18 year age Patients one blind eye . Visual acuity 20/40 eye Patients history active stage concomitant ocular disease . Patients take medication , topically route , could interfere study 's result , 3 day prior trial time period residual effect could present . Contraindications sensitivity component study treatment . Ocular surgery within past 3 month . Contact lens user . Females childbearing potential ) may participate study follow condition exist : They pregnant , They breastfeed , They positive urine pregnancy test screening , They intend become pregnant study , They agree use adequate birth control method duration study . Participation study investigational drug within 90 day previous inclusion . Discontinuation criterion : Patients could discontinue completion study adverse event , pregnancy , protocol violation , lack efficacy , administrative reason .
